static compute_returns(rewards, next_value=0.0, gamma=0.99, dones=None)[source]Â¶

Given a sequence of returns compute the vector of discounted returns [G_0, G_1, â€¦, G_T]. Note that we alse use the trick of â€˜normalizingâ€™ the returns i.e. we subtract the mean and divide by the standard deviation.
